name: Flappy Friend
description:
This is a Flappy-Bird Clone, obviously.
That's all there is to it. 

I made this as a sort of "experiment", after it took me 2 hours to install and setup unity, i thought to myself: "you know, i could download godot and  make a flappy bird clone in it in less time it takes me to setup unity!"

And so i did and here it is. 

Here's a link to the reddit post where i describe the process
in more detail if you're interested: LINK

Im not trying to make a big hit here, i figured i have it, might as well throw it out there.
It was fun to throw together a simple game and get it out in a single day.
